message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Would you like to make a purchase?
Hey Alice, I really appreciate the offer, but $110 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $105.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to pay $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Alice, I understand you're looking for $115, but I'm really capped at $108.  If you're open to that, we can make a deal.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $112. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
